recipesJson.name: Stroconut
recipesJson.author: MuuMuu
recipesJson.description: I wanted something other than a strawberry cream. I wanted a next dimension. FW Coconut Cream Pie did the trick. Everybody gets bored with flavors, this is what I always go to when I hate everything else. 5-7 Day Steep

reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from this recipe but the coconut cream pie caught my attention and thank god it did. This recipe is bright and very well balanced. A little too sweet for my taste but the addition of the coconut gave a complete new dimension and character to a very popular profile. You wouldn't guess there is any coconut without reading the recipe and I will try it with more of it. This is a 5/5 and I probably put this into my rotation of ADVs
